jto.p5graphtheory

Class Triangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • jto.p5graphtheory.Triangle

  • public class Triangle
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Triangle class.

    This represents a triangle and is included in this library for use with the static triangulation method of Graph.
    To put this in a similar context as the rest of the libary, a Triangle is a Graph with three vertices and two edges. In other words, is the complete Graph when k = 3.
    Version:
    Aug 14, 2012
    Author:
    Taylor

      • sharesVertex

        public boolean sharesVertex(Triangle other)
        This tests to see if any of the vertices of this Triangle are the same as any of the vertices of another Triangle.
        Parameters:
        other - the other Triangle to be compared.
        Returns:
        true if any of the vertices of the other Triangle are the same as any of the vertices of this Triangle.
